page.title: 14HOME LIFE
page.content: ON SATURDAY I GET UP AT 8 O'CLOCK GO DOWNSTAIRS AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST.FOR THIS I HAVE A SLICE OF TOAST AND A CUP OF TEA.THEN I GO UP STAIRS AND GET DRESSED.WHEN I COME DOWNSTAIRS I GET MY TOWEL,CAP AND GOGGLES AND WATCH THE TELEVISION TILL 9:40 am.ME AND MY MUM PICK UP MY FRIEND AND GO TO MONIFIETH HIGH SCHOOL FOR SWIMMING.FOR MY FRIEND AND I SWIMMING STARTS AT 10 0'CLOCK AND ENDS AT 11 O'CLOCK.WE PRACTISE FRONT CRAWL,BACK STROKE,BUTTERFLY AND BREAST STROKE.WE ARE NOW PRACTISING HARD ON TUMBLES.WHEN WE FINISH I COME HOME AND HAVE A ROLL OR A BRIDIE FOR DINNER.I GO ALONG THE STREET WITH MY MUM FOR SHOPPING.WE GO TO THE SUPER MARKET THEN WALK ALONG TO THE GROCER AND GO HOME.I HELP TO UNPACK THE SHOPPING,HAVE MY TEA AND WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL BEDTIME.
